item.title: About
item.description:
About stumbl.ing

I’m lockbox, and I break things for fun, and make tools to do it faster the next time.

What I Do

  • Reverse Engineering: Specializing in legacy DSP architectures
  • Vulnerability Research: Focus on RTOS/DSP bugs and embedded systems
  • Tool Development: Creator of the Styx emulator and various RE tools
  • Research: Binary similarity, SMT solving, systems understanding, emulation, egraphs

Current Focus

I’m particularly interested in:

  • Improving the state of embedded system debugging
  • Reverse engineering communications equipment and custom protocols
  • RTOS exploitation techniques
  • Building better emulation tools for obscure architectures

I’m a rust developer by day, and am slowly turning into a deno fanboy.
